GSD.product_version: versions from v4.12 to before v5.4.231
GSD.description:
tracing: Make sure trace_printk() can output as soon as it can be used

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.231 by commit 76b2390fdc80c0a8300e5da5b6b62d201b6fe9ce, it was introduced in version v4.12 by commit e725c731e3bb1e892e7b564c945b121cb41d1087. For more details please see the references link.
